attributes.action: continue to uphold and protect the current laws on broadcasting impartiality,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are proposals being put forward in the political arena to scrap the current laws on broadcasting impartiality(apart from the BBC) paving the way for Murdoch type broadcasters like Fox News.As so many newspapers are inflenced by the politial views of their owners it is important to keep broadcast news as impartial as possible.
